{"id":716602058,"lang":"java","time":"1Â week","timestamp":1654614682,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/716602058/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Toeplitz Matrix","memory":"42.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isToeplitzMatrix(int[][] matrix) {\n        int m = matrix.length; int n = matrix[0].length;\n   //     int eq = matrix[0][0];\n        HashMap<Integer,Integer> hash = new HashMap<>();\n        for(int i =0; i <m; i++){\n            for(int j =0; j<n ; j++){\n                if(hash.containsKey(i-j)){\n                    if (hash.get(i-j)!=matrix[i][j]){\n                        return false;\n                    }\n                }\n                else{\n                    hash.put(i-j , matrix[i][j]);\n                }\n                \n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"toeplitz-matrix"}
